tooltip: 0 = round line caps, 1 = butt line caps, 2 = square line caps

relative height for empty or buffer tracks
maximum chromosome number
tooltip: NB X, Y, MT chromosomes should be encoded as numbers >22 in the input data files and the maximum chromosome number should be set accordingly here; by default they will be ignored (only chromosomes 1-22 considered)

label: these two parameters specify the width / height of the legend as a proportion of the plot. you can specify them in inches too (they should add up to the total width/height of the plot). you can either specify one value for the whole legend, or a value for each row/column of the legend.

these two parameters will not get used
if the legend location is 'separate'.
bottom, left, top and right margin in inches

adjustment for the position of the legend titles
